sentences.en: a hotel lobby
sentences.cn: 宾馆大堂

sentences.en: a mass lobby of Parliament by women’s organizations
sentences.cn: 妇女团体对议会的集体游说

sentences.en: a powerful environmental lobby group
sentences.cn: 一个有影响力的环保游说团体

sentences.en: An agricultural lobby is against a law to allow importing cotton from Egypt.
sentences.cn: 农业界院外集团,反对透过一项允许从埃及进口棉花的法律.

sentences.en: As he walked through the lobby, he skirted a group of ladies.
sentences.cn: 他穿过门厅时, 绕过了一群女士.

sentences.en: He has to satisfy the environmental lobby that real progress will be made to cut emissions.
sentences.cn: 他必须令环境游说团体相信在减排方面将取得实质性进展。

sentences.en: He set up this lobby of independent producers.
sentences.cn: 他组织了这个由独立生产商组成的游说团。

sentences.en: I met her in the lobby of the museum.
sentences.cn: 我在博物馆的前厅遇见了她。

sentences.en: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.cn: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.en: It must be terribly frustrating to lobby and get absolutely nowhere.
sentences.cn: 游说未取得一点结果，一定让人非常沮丧。

sentences.en: Outside in the little lobby another scene was begin enacted.
sentences.cn: 外面的小休息室里又是另一番景象.

sentences.en: Reporters and photographers were crowded into the lobby.
sentences.cn: 记者和摄影师都挤进了大厅.

sentences.en: the anti-foxhunting lobby
sentences.cn: 反对猎狐的游说团体

sentences.en: The company hired the President's special trade representative to lobby Mr. Pierce.
sentences.cn: 公司雇用了总统的特别商业顾问去游说皮尔斯先生.

sentences.en: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.cn: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

sentences.en: The group tried to lobby the bill through.
sentences.cn: 这个集团企图施加影响使该项法案得以通过.

sentences.en: The lobby is decorated in pastels.
sentences.cn: 大厅用浅色装饰。

sentences.en: The vote is seen as a defeat for the anti-abortion lobby.
sentences.cn: 这一投票结果被看作是反堕胎游说团体的一次失败。

sentences.en: The whole lobby was a perfect pandemonium, and the din was terrific.
sentences.cn: 整个门厅一片嘈杂, 而且喧嚣刺耳.

sentences.en: The Wilderness Society lobbied Congress to authorize the Endangered Species Act.
sentences.cn: 荒野协会游说国会批准《濒危物种法》。

sentences.en: Then he looked about upon a dingy, moth - eaten hotel lobby.
sentences.cn: 这时他朝这个阴暗 、 破烂的旅馆门厅四周看了看.

sentences.en: Then he stood in the lobby, chewing the ends of his moustache.
sentences.cn: 然后,他站在门厅里, 咬着胡子尖.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 电梯门厅，电梯前廊
升降机大堂；升降机门廊

trans.tran_cn: 门厅，大厅，休息室，游说团，投票厅
trans.tran_en: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

trans.tran_cn: 为了支持或抵制某项特定目标游说
对…进行游说，陈情（试图努力影响某人采取有利行动）
